DOC.brief_summary: This study involve development evaluation web-based , interactive education program chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) primary care clinician . The research question proposal address include : 1 . Can interactive , web-based COPD course develop disseminate evidence-based , best practice recommendation primary care clinician ? 2 . Can assessment tool developed evaluate impact program clinician behavior clinical practice patient care ?
DOC.brief_title: Web-based , Interactive Professional Education Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: Primary care clinicians train willing participate Specialists
